attributes.action: Let EU nationals living in the UK vote in future Brexit referendums
attributes.additional_details: EU citizens living the UK have always been allowed to vote in EU elections. It should therefore stand to reason they should be included in a referendum regarding EU membership.
attributes.background: There are over 3.5 million EU citizens living in the UK. The result of any future EU referendum will have a direct and lasting impact on their lives, and as such their voices deserve to be heard.
